Pre-Game Insights: The 28th match of the T20 World Cup will bring high-on confidence Zimbabwe up against struggling Bangladesh on Sunday at the Gabba, Brisbane.
Bangladesh were decimated by South Africa and suffered defeat by 104 runs, while Zimbabwe clinched a thriller against Pakistan in the last over.
It will be a great opportunity for Zimbabwe to prove everyone that win against Pakistan was not just a luck, but they are here with a mission.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match is scheduled for October 30, 2022, at The Gabba, Brisbane.
Weather and pitch conditions were not detailed in the article.
